questions.question_text: Bhagwanne bhajavā ethī bījī vāt moţī _____ _____.
questions.explanation: The Vachanamrut states: 'Bhagwanne bhajavā ethī bījī vāt moţī nathī.'

questions.question_text: Which Vachanamrut contains the following quote: 'Bhagwanne bhajavā ethī bījī vāt moţī nathī.'?
questions.explanation: The quote 'Bhagwanne bhajavā ethī bījī vāt moţī nathī' is from Vach.Je.5.
